entry.title: New LUNA Coin Surges While Terra Controversy Escalates
entry.summary: The Terra token has approximately doubled in price two days after its launch, even as controversy surrounding Terra and the activities of its founders continues to grow. Terra airdropped Terra 2.0’s LUNA to holders of the network tokens of the fallen Terra Classic chain – what’s now known as Luna Classic (LUNC), and the network’s … New LUNA Coin Surges While Terra Controversy Escalates Read More »
